summary: An FBI crisis intake report from July 8, 2019, documenting a call from an individual who identified herself as an additional victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The caller described encounters with Epstein in 1996 and 1998, mentioned other potential victims, and expressed concern for her identity protection.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the child sex trafficking investigation; the caller describes encountering him in 1996 and 1998.

connections.description: The caller identifies herself as an additional victim of Jeffrey Epstein, describing personal encounters with him.

events.title: Caller's first encounter with Epstein in Miami
events.description: The caller states she encountered Jeffrey Epstein in Miami.

events.title: Caller's encounter with Epstein at W Hotel in New York
events.description: The caller states she encountered Jeffrey Epstein at the W Hotel in New York with a couple of other girls.

events.title: FBI crisis intake call regarding Epstein
events.description: An individual called the FBI National Threat Operations Center to report being an additional victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A new victim came forward to the FBI on July 8, 2019, alleging encounters with Jeffrey Epstein in 1996 (Miami) and 1998 (W Hotel, New York).
The caller mentioned there were 'a couple other girls' present at the 1998 W Hotel encounter whom she could potentially contact.
The caller provided a specific physical detail about Epstein ('the mole on his ball sack').
The caller works to 'rescue people from this lifestyle' and had discussed Epstein in a book she wrote.
The caller was concerned about protecting her identity, noting she is known on Instagram by a name different from her actual last name.
